title: Font Help!
content:
Hello,

I saw this clock in a workshop in Japan and I want to remake it and am trying to find the font of the numbers.  
Someone mentioned maybe Interstate? But it doesn't match all numbers.

Any ideas???

Thanks,

The Estate of Matt Montini

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417135531im_/http:/typophile.com/files/clock1_6188.jpg)
author: theestateofmatt...

comments.content: Interstate (Black Condensed) from Font-Bureau is very close for the numerials.

Font IDs only here please:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417135531/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

hhp
Interesting, it looks like the two 1s in this sample, from the same clock face, are different styles.
If you are refering to the slight curve in the slant on the 1 of the 10, I think it is some kind of blemish on the clock face, more apparent when you play with image in PhotoShop
